Class UserCsvHandler

java.lang.Object
utils.csv.UserCsvHandler
public class UserCsvHandler extends Object
CSV handler for User model persistence. Handles saving and updating user data in CSV files. Follows MVC pattern by separating persistence logic from model layer.
Since:
2025-11-16
Version:
1.0
Author:
NTU SC2002 Group

  • Constructor Details

    • UserCsvHandler

      private UserCsvHandler()
      Private constructor for singleton pattern.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static UserCsvHandler getInstance()
      Get singleton instance.
      Returns:
      the singleton instance

    • saveCompanyRepToCsv

      public void saveCompanyRepToCsv(CompanyRepresentative compRep)
      Save a newly registered company representative to the CSV file. Appends the new company rep to the end of the file.
      Parameters:
      compRep - the company representative to save
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if file I/O fails

    • updateCompanyRepStatusInCsv

      public void updateCompanyRepStatusInCsv(CompanyRepresentative compRep)
      Update a company representative's approval status in the CSV file. Finds the line matching the user ID and replaces it with updated data.
      Parameters:
      compRep - the company representative to update
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if file I/O fails

    • savePasswordChangeToCsv

      public void savePasswordChangeToCsv(User user)
      Save password changes to the appropriate CSV file based on user type. Uses polymorphism via getCsvFilename() method instead of instanceof checks.
      Parameters:
      user - the user whose password changed
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if file I/O fails

    • updateCsvLine

      private void updateCsvLine(String filename, String userID, String newLine)
      Updates a specific line in a CSV file. Finds the line matching the user ID and replaces it with the new line content.
      Parameters:
      filename - the CSV file path
      userID - the user ID to match
      newLine - the new line content
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if file I/O fails

    • updatePasswordInCsv

      private void updatePasswordInCsv(String filename, String userID, String newPassword)
      Updates a user's password in a specific CSV file. Finds the line matching the user ID and updates the Password column.
      Parameters:
      filename - the CSV file path
      userID - the user ID to update
      newPassword - the new password
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if file I/O fails
